Class LoginDialogController

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.GenericController

agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.access_dialog.AccessDialogController
agh.alleviation.presentation.controller.access_dialog.LoginDialogController
@Component
@FxmlView("/views/LoginDialog.fxml")
public class LoginDialogController
extends AccessDialogController
Controller responsible for user's login.

Ksenia Fiodarava
